history.content:
The Free Ventures startup accelerator is recruiting student founders for its Spring ’20 Batch! 🚀

Our team actively works with Greylock Partners, Pear, The House, Cooley law firm, Silicon Valley Bank and other partners to build the strongest community of Berkeley founders — running the full spectrum from ideation to investment. We have helped our 57 alumni teams raise over $40 million from top firms such as Y Combinator, Greylock, KPCB, and SV Angel. Collectively they’ve gone on to tackle problems in VR, drones, IoT, neuroscience, AI, real estate, and renewable energy, just to name a few.

Our founders — ranging from undergrads to MBAs and PhDs — receive equity-free funding, mentorship, workshops ranging from legal to product and fundraising, a community of founders to share in their journey, and much more.

If you are currently enrolled at UC Berkeley and working on a product or service, we encourage you to apply at http://www.freeventures.org/apply/ and discover the potential of your idea.

Applications are due Friday, February 7th at midnight.
history.subject: Free Ventures' Startup Accelerator is Recruiting!
